ud8.10:12.2: Chaṭṭhamavaggavaranti → chaṭṭhamavaggavaraṃ (bj, mr), jaccandho → tu tamandho (mr)
ud8.10:12.4: Pāṭaligāmiyamaṭṭhamavaggo → pāṭaligāmavaraṭṭhamavaggo (bj, mr) | pāṭaligāmiyavaraṭṭhamavaggo (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ud8.10:13.4: Addhā hi taṃ udānamitīdamāhu → addhā tamudānamitīdamāhu (bj) | saddhā hi taṃ udānantidamāhu (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | atthāyetaṃ udānamitimāhu (mr)
